description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Grab your friends and prepare for the ultimate Hack n Slash throwback!  Classic gameplay meets amazing graphics in this first release from super indie developer COLTRAN Studios.  Button Mash your way through +10 levels of demonic mayhem and encounter epic boss battles sure to make your thumb bleed!
